result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Alfonso Anduaga-Colin

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Alfonso Anduaga-Colin in court.  Attorney Grace Hagerman in court for Alfonso Anduaga-Colin.  Attorney J J. Crawford in court for State of Wisconsin. Minutes filed.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 8, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Alfonso Anduaga-Colin in court.  Attorney Grace Hagerman in court for Alfonso Anduaga-Colin.  Prosecuting attorney Samuel Thomas Berg in court for the State of Wisconsin.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 25, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Scheduling Order will be provided to Attys via e-filing by the Court
Signed bond filed with the court.

BOND TO COVER 22CM411, 22CT260, & 22CT340

Defendant shall not drive a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license. Defendant is to be booked and printed within twenty-four (24) hours. Defendant shall personally ensure that payments are made under any Order for Income Withholding if the Court appoints an attorney for the defendant.

Prosecuting attorney Andrew Herrmann in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Alfonso Anduaga-Colin in court. Attorney Grace Hagerman for defendant. Defendant given complaint; charges/penalties explained by the court. Reading of complaint waived. Not guilty plea entered by counsel and trial reserved. New total bond set. Scheduling Order will be provided to Attys via e-filing by the Court Minutes filed.
Status conference scheduled for September 20, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Notice of Motion and Motion for Establishment of Discovery Deadlines.
